name: Eye of the Beholder III: Assault on Myth Drannor
description:
Transport to the ruined city of Myth Drannor, where you must battle countless terrors to wrest an article of divine power from the dreaded lich Acwellan. Travel through the forest, mausoleum, temple and guilds, each filled with its own intricate puzzles and traps.

    Import your favourite characters from Eye II - with accumulated weapons, treasures and experience levels.

provider_games.name: Eye of the Beholder III: Assault on Myth Drannor
